title: Ticket #1056: Make IwdFlushNFSCache default to FALSE
description:
See description of #921 for a discussion.

VERSION HISTORY: The Schedd can attempt to flush the NFS cache for a job's Iwd on completion. This funtionality is exposed via the IwdFlushNFSCache attribute on the job (an expression). The default has been changed from true to false.
check_ins: 2010-May-05 15:17   Check-in [17940]: Made IwdFlushNFSCache default to FALSE (#1056) VERSION HISTORY: The Schedd can attempt to flush the NFS cache for a job's Iwd on completion. This funtionality is exposed via the IwdFlushNFSCache attribute on the job (an expression). The default has been changed from true to false. (By Matthew Farrellee )
creator: matt
